word:
Abridged

19 - The Big Fund

Date: July 9, 1907 Location: St. Helena, California Source: Letter 220, 1907 Status: Previously unpublished
Context: Ellen White corresponds with C.C. and Mary Nicola, veteran church workers, and informs them of her fundraising for Oakwood.
113
Dear Brother and Sister:
     Just at the beginning of our St. Helena campmeeting, I wrote you a letter; but it was mislaid, and not until today did I find it. I am sorry for the delay. Since I wrote the letter June 20, I have heard that you are at Melrose.
